Q001.label: How are you feeling overall today?

Q002.label: Have you experienced any new symptoms since your last check-in?

Q003.label: Which symptoms are you currently experiencing?

Q004.label: How would you rate your pain level?

Q005.label: Describe any concerns you would like to discuss with your care team.

Q006.label: Did you take all your medications as prescribed today?

Q007.label: How well did you sleep last night?

Q008.label: What activities did you engage in today?

Q009.label: Are you experiencing any side effects from your medications?

Q010.label: How would you rate your appetite today?

Q011.label: Have you had any falls or balance issues?

Q014.label: Do you need to speak with a healthcare provider urgently?

Q015.label: How confident do you feel managing your health today?
